snippet: The duo won four trophies, including best song and best recording for their hit single "Corre!" while the Colombian rocker Juanes won album of the year for his "MTV Unplugged" release.
abstract: The duo won four trophies, including best song and best recording for their hit single "Corre!" while the Colombian rocker Juanes won album of the year for his "MTV Unplugged" release.

headline.main: Jesse & Joy Are Big Winners at Latin Grammys
